author: Don Reisinger
title: A health expert says back-to-back cruises can make it harder to fight outbreaks
description: Cruise lines frequently send crew members on months-long deployments, requiring them to jump from one cruise to another. Travel lovers will at times get off one cruise ship and onto another, potentially carrying with them infectious diseases that infect passe…
content:
As COVID-19 continues to spread around the world, a health expert questions whether cruise lines should allow passengers and crew members to ride on back-to-back cruises.
"Closed spaces where people are having frequent contact with one another over several d… [+2390 chars]
